meanings.definition: A task or piece of work assigned to someone.
meanings.sent1: My teacher gave me an assignment to write a story.
meanings.sent2: She completed her assignment on time.
meanings.sent3: The assignment was so easy, it felt like a breeze.
meanings.sent4: Finishing the assignment was like reaching the top of a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The assignment required all my focus and effort.

meanings.definition: The allocation of a job or task to someone.
meanings.sent1: The manager's assignment was to delegate tasks to the team.
meanings.sent2: The assignment of roles was well-organized.
meanings.sent3: The assignment of snacks for the party was a fun task.
meanings.sent4: Her assignment of duties was like a chess master strategizing.
meanings.sent5: The assignment of responsibilities was clear and fair.

meanings.definition: A piece of writing given as a school task.
meanings.sent1: I forgot to bring my assignment to school today.
meanings.sent2: The teacher collected our assignments at the end of class.
meanings.sent3: His dog ate his assignment, causing a hilarious mishap.
meanings.sent4: Her assignment was a shining example of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The assignment was so engaging, I lost track of time.
